translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)🔽8.32. Oghadukādi🔽Nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Oghagocchakayogagocchakesu āmasanaṁ āsavagocchake āmasanasadisaṁ.)🔽Nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. (Nīvaraṇagocchake āmasanaṁ saññojanagocchake āmasanasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  ogha duka ādi  noogham dhammam paṭicca pe noyogam dhammam paṭicca pe ogha gocchaka yoga gocchakesu āmasanam āsava gocchake āmasana sadisa  no nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca pe nīvaraṇa gocchake āmasanam saññojana gocchake āmasana sadisa
